entries.abort: Yes, run like the coward that you are, CorSec. You will face the wrath of the Cloaks soon.
entries.arrival_phase_1: We are having difficulty tracking the Cloak leader. Stand by while we filter the scan data.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Target found. Projected path plotted based on current heading. Intercept and disable the target, and upload the auto-pilot override program.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: <pcontrast3  Warning. Enemy craft inbound.pcontrast1 >
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: <pcontrast3  Enemy threat neutralized.pcontrast1 >
entries.capture_complete: Copy that. Acknowledge completion of program upload sequence. Escort the target home, pilot.
entries.capture_phase_1: Oh no! Please don't upload that program. It can't be!
entries.capture_phase_2: All is lost! I am captured. REPEAT. I AM CAPTURED!
entries.capture_started: We copy that, pilot. Acknowledge initiation of auto-pilot override program upload sequence.
entries.complete: Something doesn't seem right here, pilot. Stay alert.
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: <pcontrast3  Secondary target destroyed. %DI escort ship(s) remaining.pcontrast1 >
entries.escort_wiped_out: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: <pcontrast3  Secondary target destroyed. Escort wing eliminated.pcontrast1 >
entries.failed_destroy: The commander is not going to be pleased that you let the Cloak leader be destroyed. Return to the station for debriefing, pilot.
entries.failed_escape: The commander is not going to be pleased that you let the Cloak leader escape. Return to the station for debriefing, pilot.
entries.panic_1: Uh oh! You are in for it now!
entries.quest_disable_d: Intercept the Cloak leader, but do not destroy him. Damage his ship only enough to disable him and prevent him from escaping.
entries.quest_escort_d: Once the Cloak leader is under our control, escort him back to Command for detainment. You can probably expect heavy resistance here.
entries.quest_location_d: The Cloak leader is moving through the Corellia system.
entries.quest_recover_d: Move in close to the disabled Cloak leader's ship and the auto-pilot override program will begin to upload automatically.
entries.recovery_success: Something doesn't seem right here, pilot. Stay alert.
entries.split_quest_alert: The other ship was a decoy. The true Cloak leader is incoming on attack vector. Your auto-pilot program is wasted, you must destroy him.
entries.target_disabled: Confirming target ship as disabled. Proceed with program upload sequence.
entries.thanks_1: Don't worry, your time will come.
entries.title: Corellia System: Capture the Cloak Leader
entries.title_d: The Cloak leader is on the move through the Corellian system. CorSec command wants him disabled, captured, and brought back to Command for detainment.
